44.lns: Sòv njoŋ, wo bàraʼ kfə̀n yoŋ sa jii, COVID-19 və̀n dzə̀ yásí, a bó wù yòʼ-oò sì. Vé-eè tòmbìy, e yù léŋ yàsí və̀n, a dzə̀ fó Càáyínà, kishiíy 31 fo ŋwee Ntinèn Saàr, e kiya kee 2019. Vifíʼìr vé yàsí və̀n vi dzə̀ kishwimnèn kee fìn yúy, é yí wáa shaà, é kinjàʼ ki shúr, é wúne wáa nyar, a wèŋrì wèŋrìn. Yàsí və̀n túy sóŋ e wìr wùn, laá wáa yen, bo kù sì kpú.Yàsí və̀n ram vitúm vidzə̀m e kitu ke nsay. Bó á yóʼ ne kìíy fo wù loòn gheéy.
44.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

45.lns: Sòv njoŋ, wo bàraʼ kfə̀n yoŋ sa jii, COVID-19 və̀n dzə̀ yásí, a bó wù yòʼ-oò sì. Vé-eè tòmbìy, e yù léŋ yàsí və̀n, a dzə̀ fó Càáyínà, kishiíy 31 fo ŋwee Ntinèn Saàr, e kiya kee 2019. Vifíʼìr vé yàsí və̀n vi dzə̀ kishwimnèn kee fìn yúy, é yí wáa shaà, é kinjàʼ ki shúr, é wúne wáa nyar, a wèŋrì wèŋrìn. Yàsí və̀n túy sóŋ e wìr wùn, laá wáa yen, bo kù sì kpú.Yàsí və̀n ram vitúm vidzə̀m e kitu ke nsay. Bó á yóʼ ne kìíy fo wù loòn gheéy.
45.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

46.lns: Sòv njoŋ, wo bàraʼ kfə̀n yoŋ sa jii, COVID-19 və̀n dzə̀ yásí, a bó wù yòʼ-oò sì. Vé-eè tòmbìy, e yù léŋ yàsí və̀n, a dzə̀ fó Càáyínà, kishiíy 31 fo ŋwee Ntinèn Saàr, e kiya kee 2019. Vifíʼìr vé yàsí və̀n vi dzə̀ kishwimnèn kee fìn yúy, é yí wáa shaà, é kinjàʼ ki shúr, é wúne wáa nyar, a wèŋrì wèŋrìn. Yàsí və̀n túy sóŋ e wìr wùn, laá wáa yen, bo kù sì kpú.Yàsí və̀n ram vitúm vidzə̀m e kitu ke nsay. Bó á yóʼ ne kìíy fo wù loòn gheéy.
46.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

55.lns: Wír wo wù kér yàsí woo kùm shilív
55.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

56.lns: Wír wo wù kér yàsí woo kùm shilív
56.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

57.lns: Yàsí wo fíy və̀n kù koó wir dzə̀m, a ŋgàywìr, à wánlè. Wù koó ŋgày sé wìr, kí fòy fóyin. Kù dzə̀ sá mo kí dzəə̀n fo wìr ve á sí ker nyar símóʼ sí moo, kighiísí ke nsaŋ ki, yàsí woo dàábetìr, yàsí shilìv, e lì yàsí mensə me koʼón mè.
57.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

58.lns: Yàsí wo fíy və̀n kù koó wir dzə̀m, a ŋgàywìr, à wánlè. Wù koó ŋgày sé wìr, kí fòy fóyin. Kù dzə̀ sá mo kí dzəə̀n fo wìr ve á sí ker nyar símóʼ sí moo, kighiísí ke nsaŋ ki, yàsí woo dàábetìr, yàsí shilìv, e lì yàsí mensə me koʼón mè.
58.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

59.lns: Yàsí wo fíy və̀n kù koó wir dzə̀m, a ŋgàywìr, à wánlè. Wù koó ŋgày sé wìr, kí fòy fóyin. Kù dzə̀ sá mo kí dzəə̀n fo wìr ve á sí ker nyar símóʼ sí moo, kighiísí ke nsaŋ ki, yàsí woo dàábetìr, yàsí shilìv, e lì yàsí mensə me koʼón mè.
59.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

70.lns: Vifiʼìr vé sòv njoŋ vi shwínen vé ayàsí vee moo, kishwimnèn, kinjàʼ, kighiísíi ke yumér kí, à dóri. Sòv njoŋ koó wír ámóʼó, wúné wàa nyar, yúyi wàa fìnèn, vibum vi wàa səy, kilòŋ kí taàm, kìn bvə́me wàa dù. Sòv njoŋ koó ámóʼó vee wír, áwune wàa dzə kév kijuŋ, la vifiʼìr ví yòʼ a dìn. Kùʼùn wìr dzə̀, aá lo, á bònén fó sòv njoŋ, a bó yòʼ dzə̀ wìr kìíy ji sà fèr kfə́ə shìv siné á.
70.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

71.lns: Vifiʼìr vé sòv njoŋ vi shwínen vé ayàsí vee moo, kishwimnèn, kinjàʼ, kighiísíi ke yumér kí, à dóri. Sòv njoŋ koó wír ámóʼó, wúné wàa nyar, yúyi wàa fìnèn, vibum vi wàa səy, kilòŋ kí taàm, kìn bvə́me wàa dù. Sòv njoŋ koó ámóʼó vee wír, áwune wàa dzə kév kijuŋ, la vifiʼìr ví yòʼ a dìn. Kùʼùn wìr dzə̀, aá lo, á bònén fó sòv njoŋ, a bó yòʼ dzə̀ wìr kìíy ji sà fèr kfə́ə shìv siné á.
71.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

72.lns: Vifiʼìr vé sòv njoŋ vi shwínen vé ayàsí vee moo, kishwimnèn, kinjàʼ, kighiísíi ke yumér kí, à dóri. Sòv njoŋ koó wír ámóʼó, wúné wàa nyar, yúyi wàa fìnèn, vibum vi wàa səy, kilòŋ kí taàm, kìn bvə́me wàa dù. Sòv njoŋ koó ámóʼó vee wír, áwune wàa dzə kév kijuŋ, la vifiʼìr ví yòʼ a dìn. Kùʼùn wìr dzə̀, aá lo, á bònén fó sòv njoŋ, a bó yòʼ dzə̀ wìr kìíy ji sà fèr kfə́ə shìv siné á.
72.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

77.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

78.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

79.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

88.lns: Mo dzə̀ à kiŋsìn kitú ké

89.lns: Mo dzə̀ à kiŋsìn kitú ké

90.lns: 1. Lá à yòʼ a wàʼrì, a dù e kiwó ki é si, kìn é yuy, ǎ shuù.

91.lns: 1. Lá à yòʼ a wàʼrì, a dù e kiwó ki é si, kìn é yuy, ǎ shuù.

92.lns: 1. Lá à yòʼ a wàʼrì, a dù e kiwó ki é si, kìn é yuy, ǎ shuù.

95.lns: 2. Kú a wàʼrì, a sù wó yée e shuvi e mendzə̀v me mè léŋ leŋén, kìn me mè fəə́ fəə́n fo kifa.
95.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

96.lns: 2. Kú a wàʼrì, a sù wó yée e shuvi e mendzə̀v me mè léŋ leŋén, kìn me mè fəə́ fəə́n fo kifa.
96.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

99.lns: 3. À lóo kiisí, kìn à shém shemén, a bvə̀n kóy, e sə̀tí shuu kìn yúy yé sho.

100.lns: 3. À lóo kiisí, kìn à shém shemén, a bvə̀n kóy, e sə̀tí shuu kìn yúy yé sho.

103.lns: 4. Lá à yòʼ a kfər nyám e kó. À yén nyám, a yì gháné, làa yòʼ a səʼ wó e wùn wó.
103.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

104.lns: 4. Lá à yòʼ a kfər nyám e kó. À yén nyám, a yì gháné, làa yòʼ a səʼ wó e wùn wó.
104.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

118.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

119.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

122.lns: 7. Ku bàʼàr virə́ʼ vidzə̀m ve wíri táti fo vi.

123.lns: 7. Ku bàʼàr virə́ʼ vidzə̀m ve wíri táti fo vi.

126.lns: 8. Bàʼàr gháne, bánlà é kitu ke kinyò keé shií.

127.lns: 8. Bàʼàr gháne, bánlà é kitu ke kinyò keé shií.

130.lns: 9. Á dzətí asáʼkaá, yii bèy à yú kinyo, à tàr ji sà kù dzə̀ suuyrú á.
130.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

131.lns: 9. Á dzətí asáʼkaá, yii bèy à yú kinyo, à tàr ji sà kù dzə̀ suuyrú á.
131.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

145.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.
